name: TurnKee
storyline: In a dark and dangerous dungeon, you are Monkee, a brave adventurer who seeks the keys to escape. But beware, every move you make counts. You can only move one tile every turn, and so can your enemies. Use your wits and skills to avoid traps, fight monsters and find the way out. TurnKee is a pixel art turn-based dungeon crawler with roguelite elements.
summary:
A pixel art turn-based dungeon crawler where you choose to move one tile every turn.
You are Monkee. You're in some dungeon. There's keys in the rooms. They might be useful. There's enemies. Probably should avoid them...
